sen.j: 荒神口通（こうじんぐちどおり）は京都市内の東西の通り。
sen.e: Kojinguchi-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Kyoto City.
Kojinguchi-dori Street is a street running eat-west in Kyoto City.
Kojinguchi-dori Street is a street running eat-west in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 鴨川 (淀川水系)に架かる荒神橋から西へ寺町通まで500mに満たない短い通りである。
sen.e: Kamo River: the short river it isn't long as 500m which runs from Kojin Bridge which is on the Kamo River (Yodo River series) to Teramachi-dori Street to the west.
The street itself is short, not even reaching a length of 500m, and runs from Kojin Bridge which is on the Kamo River (Yodo River series) to Teramachi-dori Street to the west.
The street itself is short, not even reaching a length of 500m, and runs from Kojin-bashi Bridge which is on the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River series) to Teramachi-dori Street to the west.
sen.cmt: Kojin-bashi Bridge, Kamo-gawa River, Yodo-gawa Riverとしました。

sen.j: 御所から比叡山への最短の経路で、鴨川を徒渉し東岸を東やや北へ向かう志賀越道に道をとった。
sen.e: This is the shortest a route from Imperial Place to Mount Hiei, they walked inside of Kamo River and made a road at Shigogoemichi which is east with slightly toward to north at the east side of the river.
This is the shortest route from the Imperial Place to Mount Hiei, and the road takes a path inside of Kamo River and bears east and slightly northward to Shigogoemichi.
This is the shortest route from the Imperial Palace to Mt. Hiei, and the road takes a path inside of Kamo-gawa River and bears east and slightly northward to Shigagoemichi road.
sen.cmt: Imperial Place→Imperial Palaceに修正、Mt. Hiei, Kamo-gawa Riverとしました。志賀越道のスペルを訂正し、Shigagoemichi roadとしました。

sen.j: 名前の由来は寺町通東入の護浄院に荒神がまつられていることによる。
sen.e: The name came from the Gojo-in Temple which was located on Teramachi-dori Street higashi iru used to dedicated the Kojin.
The name came from Gojo-in Temple which was located on Teramachi-dori Street higashi iru which used to be dedicated to Kojin.
The name came from Gojo-in Temple which was located on Teramachi-dori Street higashi iru which used to be dedicated to Kojin.

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に修正

sen.j: 京都大学アジアアフリカ地域研究研究科 川端通
sen.e: Graduate School of Asian and African Area Studies, Kyoto University, Kawabata-dori Street
Graduate School of Asian and African Area Studies, Kyoto University, Kawabata-dori Street
Graduate School of Asian and African Area Studies, Kyoto University, Kawabata-dori Street

sen.j: 京都地方法務局 三本木東入
sen.e: Kyoto District Legal Affairs Bureau, Sanbongi higashi iru
Kyoto District Legal Affairs Bureau, Sanbongi higashi iru
Kyoto District Legal Affairs Bureau, Sanbongi higashi-iru

sen.j: 護浄院（三宝荒神） 新烏丸東入
sen.e: Gojo-in Temple (Sanpo kojin), Karasuma higashi iru
Gojo-in Temple (Sanpo kojin), Karasuma higashi iru
Gojo-in Temple (Sanpo kojin), Shin Karasuma higashi-iru
sen.cmt: Karasuma higashi iru→Shin Karasuma higashi-iruに修正

sen.j: 京都府立鴨沂高等学校 寺町通下ル
sen.e: Kyoto Prefectural Ouki High School, Teramachi-dori Street sagaru
Kyoto Prefectural Ouki High School, Teramachi-dori Street sagaru
Kyoto Prefectural Ouki High School, Teramachi-dori Street sagaru
Kyoto Imperial Garden(Kyoto Gyoen), Teramachi-dori Street
